alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:16AM MDT until July 12 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR WESTERN LYON...NORTHWESTERN SIOUX...MINNEHAHA...LINCOLN...EASTERN MCCOOK AND TURNER COUNTIES... At 415 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Renner to near Lennox to near Viborg, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Brandon, Harrisburg, Worthing, Corson, Palisades State Park, Rowena, Lake Alvin State Recreation Area, Valley Springs, Canton, Newton Hills State Park and Fairview. Winds to 72 mph were measured at Joe Foss field at 413 am CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across the Sioux Falls metro area. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
